com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players

Class AbstractPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.AbstractPlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NPC, User

    public abstract class AbstractPlayer
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
    The base class for all new characters in the game.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean aligned
      The boolean instance representing if the AbstractPlayer is correctly positioned onto one of the game tiles.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle currentCollisionRectangle
      The Rectangle instance representing the boundaries of the AbstractPlayer to detect collisions.
      private Pokemon[] currentPokemon
      The Pokemon array instance representing the Player's PokemonData slots.
      private byte direction
      The byte instance representing where the AbstractPlayer is pointing towards.
      private static byte DOWN
      The byte representing the 'down' direction for when the character is moving downwards or at a constant position pointing down.
      private boolean futureCollision
      The boolean instance representing if the AbstractPlayer is going to collide in the next tile position by referencing the direction of the AbstractPlayer to identify the correct Rectangle the AbstractPlayer would be on top of.
      private static byte LEFT
      The byte representing the 'left' direction for when the character is moving to the left of at a constant position pointing to the left.
      private MapCreator mapCreator
      The MapCreator instance representing the current map the AbstractPlayer is on, which is used to calculate whether the AbstractPlayer is colliding with any of the objects of the map.
      private static int MAX_POKEMON
      The max amount of slots with PokemonData a Player can have at one time.
      private boolean moving
      The boolean instance representing if the HandleInput of the AbstractPlayer has a keyboard press that will represent that the AbstractPlayer is to try and move throughout the map.
      private java.lang.String name
      The String instance representing a Player's name.
      private float positionX
      The float instance representing where the AbstractPlayer is every frame in terms of horizontal pixels.
      private float positionY
      The float instance representing where the AbstractPlayer is every frame in terms of vertical pixels.
      private PlayerActions previousState
      The PlayerActions instance representing the last action the AbstractPlayer was in to implement smoot animation transitions and to check whether the animation of the AbstractPlayer should be reset or continued.
      private boolean restrictedMovement
      The boolean instance representing if the AbstractPlayer is able to move not in terms of collisions but during some scenes in the game.
      private static byte RIGHT
      The byte representing the 'right' direction for when the character is moving to the right or at a constant position pointing to the right.
      private float stateTimer
      The float instance used to represent the amount of time passed during a new action, also specifying which frame is to be drawn.
      private static byte UP
      The byte representing the 'up' direction for when the character is moving upwards or at a constant position pointing up.

    • Field Detail

      • UP

        private static final byte UP
        The byte representing the 'up' direction for when the character is moving upwards or at a constant position pointing up.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DOWN

        private static final byte DOWN
        The byte representing the 'down' direction for when the character is moving downwards or at a constant position pointing down.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RIGHT

        private static final byte RIGHT
        The byte representing the 'right' direction for when the character is moving to the right or at a constant position pointing to the right.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LEFT

        private static final byte LEFT
        The byte representing the 'left' direction for when the character is moving to the left of at a constant position pointing to the left.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_POKEMON

        private static final int MAX_POKEMON
        The max amount of slots with PokemonData a Player can have at one time.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • positionX

        private float positionX
        The float instance representing where the AbstractPlayer is every frame in terms of horizontal pixels.

      • positionY

        private float positionY
        The float instance representing where the AbstractPlayer is every frame in terms of vertical pixels.

      • moving

        private boolean moving
        The boolean instance representing if the HandleInput of the AbstractPlayer has a keyboard press that will represent that the AbstractPlayer is to try and move throughout the map.

      • aligned

        private boolean aligned
        The boolean instance representing if the AbstractPlayer is correctly positioned onto one of the game tiles. This may also be thought of as a snap-to-grid type of system.

      • mapCreator

        private MapCreator mapCreator
        The MapCreator instance representing the current map the AbstractPlayer is on, which is used to calculate whether the AbstractPlayer is colliding with any of the objects of the map.

      • currentCollisionRectangle

        private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle currentCollisionRectangle
        The Rectangle instance representing the boundaries of the AbstractPlayer to detect collisions.

      • previousState

        private PlayerActions previousState
        The PlayerActions instance representing the last action the AbstractPlayer was in to implement smoot animation transitions and to check whether the animation of the AbstractPlayer should be reset or continued.

      • futureCollision

        private boolean futureCollision
        The boolean instance representing if the AbstractPlayer is going to collide in the next tile position by referencing the direction of the AbstractPlayer to identify the correct Rectangle the AbstractPlayer would be on top of. This ensures the AbstractPlayer stays aligned with the tiles.

      • restrictedMovement

        private boolean restrictedMovement
        The boolean instance representing if the AbstractPlayer is able to move not in terms of collisions but during some scenes in the game.

      • direction

        private byte direction
        The byte instance representing where the AbstractPlayer is pointing towards.

      • stateTimer

        private float stateTimer
        The float instance used to represent the amount of time passed during a new action, also specifying which frame is to be drawn.

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        The String instance representing a Player's name.

      • currentPokemon

        private Pokemon[] currentPokemon
        The Pokemon array instance representing the Player's PokemonData slots.
